title: 03: S6E03 – "Quietly into the Night" – Scary Stories Told in the Dark
description:
In this special 3+ hour-long episode of Scary Stories Told in the Dark, we bring you three terrifying tales from author Rebecca Klingel (a.k.a. C.K. Walker), about dastardly disappearances, criminal comeuppance, and cryptic calls – and including Rebecca’s feature-length epic, Borrasca.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
